// Execute a trade (amount can be any uint256, e.g., 100)
const contract = new ethers.Contract(address, abi, signer);
const signer = await ethers.getSigner(); // Uses your PRIVATE_KEY from .env
const address = require("./backend/src/config/contract.json").address;
const abi = require("./backend/src/config/contract.json").abi;
const { ethers } = require("hardhat");
